channel.title: How to add special attack bar on a item 614
channel.description:
hey, i've a zaryte bar. but i would like to have it a special. i want it like it's a dark bow spec
[shadow=red,left]if u don't help please don't post[/shadow]

item.title: How to add special attack bar on a item 614
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

I assume special attack bars exist for subsequent items thus, it makes much sense to look for how it’s implemented in other weapons.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add special attack bar on a item 614

item.title: How to add special attack bar on a item 614
item.dc:creator: @Angel_Carlos Angel Carlos
item.description:
@Angel_Carlos wrote:

I forget what file this goes, but I am pretty sure it is one called “combatspecial” I am not very sure, I forgot.

If not, then search anything with Dragon Claws, Granite Maul, with the itemId, and open up the one with combat in it

Read full topic
